pr_title: Allow user to set Language Hints for Note Editor fields

timeline.bodyText: Flagging in case there's a better way here
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
NoteEditor: ActionItem to change field language

This adds a "Set field language" context menu item on the Note Editor
This will set and save the keyboard hint locale to the model.

Designed to enable discoverability of the field language functionality

Add "set keyboard language hint" to fields

Android >= N (24). TextViews can have `setImeHintLocales` called
which will change a multilingual keyboard to the provided locale if
available.

This does not currently work for SwiftKey, but does work with GBoard.

Fixes #3496
